materials.raw_text:
Cobalt (Co): 16 g 
 Phosphorus (P): 12 g 
 Scandium (Sc): 2 g 
 Zirconium (Zr): 6 g

sourcing.instructions:
Cobalt: Purchase from a chemical supplier or online marketplace (e.g., Sigma-Aldrich). 
 Phosphorus: Obtain white phosphorus from a chemical supply store. 
 Scandium: Source from specialized metal suppliers or online vendors. 
 Zirconium: Available from metal suppliers or online marketplaces that specialize in raw materials.
